betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oYou may have been able to rush the pack until this point, but from now on, it is going to be pretty much impossible.

Make sure you have passive setups (or very efficient autocrafts) for all resources that are used in lots of recipes. Garnets, for example, are good to have in a steady supply.

Make sure your autocrafts are fast and reliable. If there are multiple recipes for one item, it'll be a good idea to use the easiest option available at the moment.

Take a look at the side quests! There are lots of goodies there that should help out!
